chapter.text: 100|1|a l laoh sbath nung satv seh teanglay del rt teang danghok  nowknong samorphoumi .
100|2|ning satv seh del rt yeang luen chenh phkaphleung tam krachk  robsa vea .
100|3|ning satv seh del vea baol samrouk tow khmangosatrauv teang pruk  prolum .
100|4|haey puokvea thveu aoy thouli hoyotrolom nowchampohmoukh puok  satrauv  .
100|5|haey puokvea samroukchaul tow kandal hvaung satrauv  .
100|6|pitabrakd nasa  mnoussa lok ku rmilkoun champoh mcheasa  robsa ke .
100|7|haey pitabrakd nasa  ke kuchea saksaei leu rueng noh
100|8|piproh ke  kuchea mnoussa del sraleanh tropy sa mb tde yeang  khlang .
100|9|dau che  neah  tae ke mindoeng te ryytha  nowpel del avei  nowknong phnaur  trauv ke b po  ch nh mk( daembi chomnoumchomreah)
100|10|ning avei del mean nowknong chetd( robsa mnoussa) nung trauv ke  leatatradeang aoy kheunh yeang chbasa noh
100|11|pitabrakd nasa  now thngai noh mcheasa robsa puokke doeng bamphot  champoh ruengreav robsa puokke .
